articles.author: Malou Talosig-Bartolome
articles.title: 10 European countries recall Lucky Me! instant noodles, pancit canton | Malou Talosig-Bartolome - BusinessMirror
articles.description: Food safety authorities among 27 members of the European Union (EU) were notified that Lucky Me! instant noodles and pancit canton produced in Thailand have been found to contain traces of pesticide. This prompted at least 10 EU countries—Ireland, France, Ger…
articles.content: Food safety authorities among 27 members of the European Union (EU) were notified that Lucky Me! instant noodles and pancit canton produced in Thailand have been found to contain traces of pesticide.… [+3596 chars]
